section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using the platform, you agree to these terms of use. If you disagree with any part of these terms, do not use our services.

section2.title: 2. Restricted Access
section2.content: Our platform is restricted and exclusive to verified users. Unauthorized access or attempts to bypass our security systems will result in appropriate legal actions.

section3.title: 3. Services and Fees
section3.content: Our service facilitates communication between buyers and sellers of vehicles through an automated messaging system. Each message sent costs â‚¬0.05 (five cents of a euro).

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer of Liability
section4.content: Our platform acts only as an intermediary in communication between buyers and sellers. We do not own the listed vehicles and are not responsible for:

list.item1: The accuracy of the information provided by sellers
list.item2: The condition of the listed vehicles
list.item3: Negotiations or transactions made between parties
list.item4: Technical or mechanical issues of the vehicles
list.item5: Disputes or conflicts between buyers and sellers

section5.title: 5. Use of WhatsApp Bot
section5.content: Our platform uses an automated WhatsApp bot that allows:

list.item2: Automated collection of vehicle and seller data

section5.extra: Users are responsible for the proper use of this tool and must comply with WhatsApp's usage policies.

section6.title: 6. Data Protection
section6.content: All information collected and processed through our platform is subject to our Privacy Policy. Unauthorized or improper use of data will result in legal penalties.

section7.title: 7. Changes to the Terms
section7.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. It is the user's responsibility to periodically check for updates.

section1.title: 1. Data Collection
section1.content: Our platform collects and processes data necessary for the operation of the service, including:

section2.title: 2. Data Usage
section2.content: The collected data is used for:

list.item1: Facilitating communication between buyers and sellers
list.item2: Improving user experience on the platform
list.item3: Ensuring the security and integrity of the service

section3.title: 3. Data Protection
section3.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data, including:

section4.title: 4. Data Sharing
section4.content: Your data may be shared only under the following circumstances:

list.item1: Between buyers and sellers to facilitate negotiation
list.item2: With service providers necessary for platform operation
list.item3: By legal request or court order

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.content: We retain your data only for the necessary duration to:

list.item1: Fulfill the purposes for which it was collected

section7.title: 7. Contact
section7.content: For privacy-related concerns, contact us through the official channels available on our platform.
